description:
doc: update Go1 release notes to use correct WalkFunc error signature.

filepath's WalkFunc handler now uses errors package, and not
os.Error

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=0fa62412dbdd ***

doc: update Go1 release notes to use correct WalkFunc error signature.

filepath's WalkFunc handler now uses errors package, and not
os.Error

Fixed description should read os.Error not os.Errors.
